description: For many people,&nbsp;scotch, sweet vermouth, cherry brandy, and orange juice may not belong together; but liquor drinkers that have already tried Blood and Sand say otherwise. Scotch and sweet vermouth is already a tried and tested combination, but the addition of cherry brandy and orange juice takes it to a whole new level and gives another dimension of flavors.
